title: Spicy Meatballs with Pasta
ingredients: ['For the Meatballs', '500g extra-lean minced beef', '55g breadcrumbs', '1 tablespoon Italian herb mix', '2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '2 tablespoons sweet chilli sauce', '75g tomato ketchup', '2 tablespoons BBQ sauce', '1/2 teaspoon soy sauce', '1 egg', '1/2 teaspoon crushed chillies or chilli powder', '1 pinch salt and pepper', '1 (500g) packet pasta', 'For the Sauce', '1 large onion, diced', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', "2 (500g) jars tomato pasta sauce with garlic, such as Dolmio's", '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon Italian herb mix', '125ml dry sherry', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'oil for frying']
